name: Yet Another Platformer (DvorakDwarf)
description:
Controls: 

WASD = Movement

E/Shift + Direction = Dash

Space = Jump

You have a double jump

Credits:
Everything but the artwork: Me 
The artwork: https://itch.io/profile/gangstrhamstr

This is a short game that I wanted to make to see how much I know and what I should learn. Feedback would be appreciated
